text: I spend a lot of time sitting in front of the computer, and it started to take a toll on my body, especially with back pain and soreness. After a friend recommended Guo Tai, I decided to give it a try, and it was the best decision! Joelle at the reception was incredibly friendly, attentive, and welcoming. She made sure everything was arranged perfectly for me. The therapist was also very professional and skilled. After just a few sessions, my body felt lighter, and the pain was significantly reduced. I’m really grateful for their care and dedication. Highly recommend Guo Tai to anyone looking for effective body treatment!

I came here for acupuncture and herbal king moxibustion. I’ve had digestive issues and fatigue for years, but after 4 sessions, I feel much lighter and more energetic. Physician Kuan is very knowledgeable and attentive. I highly recommend this clinic if you’re looking for holistic treatments.

Had a great experience at Guo Tai TCM. The space is clean and calming felt more like a wellness lounge than a clinic. The practitioner really listened and tailored the treatment to how I was feeling. After a few sessions, I felt more rested, less tense, and more balanced overall. Definitely not a one size fits all approach, which I appreciated.

Very positive experiences visiting the Guo Tai TCM Somerset outlet so far, and would highly recommend for others to visit! The front desk staff are very warm and service-oriented, making sure customers are attended to even if there is a waiting period, especially Joelle and Bernice who assisted me that day. Physician Guo is very professional and is able to diagnose my ailments accurately, and I have experienced significant improvements in my conditions after heeding her advice and prescriptions. Please keep up the great work!

I have had good experience with the 95 Imperial Herbal Therapy and Herbal King Moxibustion treatment.   All of the staff at the front desk are nice and made me feel great, especially kudos  to Joelle who is very patient, knowledgeable and attentive.   Dr Guo is very experienced, patient and professional.   Her insightful advice has been  invaluable towards better health.
